title: Welcome to Superpowers!
prompt: Superpowers lets you collaborate with people around the world.

askGameInstall.title: Getting started
askGameInstall.prompt: Superpowers uses various system to create various projects. The most widely used is the "Superpowers Game" system, which allows you to create HTML5 2D+3D game projects. Do you want to install this system now?
askGameInstall.waiting: The "Superpowers Game" system is being installed. It will take a couple minutes.

serverInformation.title: Local server management
serverInformation.info: You can manage your own local server from the bottom-left corner. It has been initially setup to start automatically when you launch the app.

sidebarInformation.title: Server list
sidebarInformation.info: The sidebar on the left list your favorite servers. Your local server has already been added. Double click on it to open the hub and create your first project!
